keyMoments.title: Rob Lucci Defeats Big Helmet Pirates
keyMoments.description: Lucci demonstrates his combat prowess alongside fellow Galley-La shipwrights by easily defeating the Big Helmet Pirates with their captain worth 36 million berries.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Rob Lucci, establishing him as a skilled fighter while concealing his true identity as CP9's strongest agent.

keyMoments.title: Lucci Praised by Water 7 Citizens
keyMoments.description: A crowd gathers to praise Lucci as one of the city's finest shipwrights. He is accompanied by his pigeon Hattori, who appears to speak through ventriloquism.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how successfully Lucci has integrated into Water 7 society over his five years undercover, earning the trust and admiration of citizens while hiding his true nature.

relationships.description: Lucci's pet pigeon who serves as his ventriloquist dummy, allowing the emotionless Lucci to appear sociable.

evolutionMoments.description: Hattori is introduced alongside Lucci, serving as his means of social interaction.

relationships.description: Lucci works under Iceburg at Galley-La while secretly plotting against him as a CP9 agent.

evolutionMoments.description: Established as one of Iceburg's trusted shipwrights at Galley-La Company.

reveals.information: Works as a shipwright for Galley-La Company, specializing in sawing, treenails, and bolts
Uses ventriloquism with his pigeon Hattori to appear sociable while maintaining an emotionless demeanor

keyMoments.title: Hattori Introduced as Lucci's Pigeon
keyMoments.description: Hattori appears as Rob Lucci's white pigeon companion wearing a red tie, serving as Lucci's ventriloquist dummy to help him blend into Water 7 society.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Lucci's unique companion who allows the cold CP9 agent to maintain his cover by appearing to express emotions.

relationships.description: Lucci's loyal pigeon companion who serves as his ventriloquist dummy.

evolutionMoments.description: Introduced as Lucci's constant companion and means of social expression.

reveals.information: Always wears a light red tie
Highly intelligent and able to understand and mimic human mannerisms as part of Lucci's ventriloquism act

keyMoments.title: Paulie Defeats Big Helmet Pirates
keyMoments.description: Paulie demonstrates his rope techniques and combat skills alongside other Galley-La shipwrights to defeat the Big Helmet Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Paulie, who will become an important ally to the Straw Hats and one of Iceburg's most trusted subordinates.

keyMoments.title: Paulie Introduced as Rope Specialist
keyMoments.description: Paulie is formally introduced as one of Galley-La's skilled foremen, known for his expertise with ropes.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Paulie's role as both a craftsman and combatant, showcasing the dual nature of Water 7's shipwrights.

abilities.description: Paulie uses ropes as weapons and tools in combat, demonstrating his expertise.

relationships.description: Works as one of Iceburg's trusted foremen at Galley-La Company.

evolutionMoments.description: Shown as a loyal member of Galley-La under Iceburg's leadership.

reveals.information: Foreman and rigging specialist at Galley-La Company Dock 1
Expert rope user who can employ ropes in combat

keyMoments.title: Iceburg Introduced as Mayor and Galley-La President
keyMoments.description: Iceburg is introduced as both the mayor of Water 7 and president of the prestigious Galley-La Company, representing the pride of the city's shipbuilding industry.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Iceburg as the most important figure in Water 7, whose dual role emphasizes the central importance of shipbuilding to the city's identity.

reveals.information: Mayor of Water 7 and president of Galley-La Company
Has a pet mouse companion

keyMoments.title: Kalifa Introduced as Iceburg's Secretary
keyMoments.description: Kalifa appears as Iceburg's efficient and professional secretary at Galley-La Company.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Kalifa, a CP9 agent undercover whose position gives her access to information about the Ancient Weapon Pluton.

relationships.description: Serves as Iceburg's secretary while secretly plotting against him as a CP9 agent.

evolutionMoments.description: Introduced as Iceburg's trusted secretary and advisor.

reveals.information: Secretary and advisor to Iceburg at Galley-La Company

keyMoments.title: Kaku Helps Defeat Big Helmet Pirates
keyMoments.description: Kaku is introduced as one of the Galley-La shipwrights who defeats the Big Helmet Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Kaku, a CP9 agent whose genuine carpentry skills hide his true identity as an assassin.

keyMoments.title: Kaku Introduced as Expert Shipwright
keyMoments.description: Kaku is formally introduced as one of Galley-La's expert shipwrights, respected for his craftsmanship.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kaku's cover identity and genuine skills that he developed during his five years in Water 7.

relationships.description: Works under Iceburg at Galley-La while secretly being a CP9 agent.

evolutionMoments.description: Established as one of Galley-La's skilled shipwrights.

reveals.information: Expert shipwright at Galley-La Company

keyMoments.title: Blueno Whispers 'CP9' to Robin
keyMoments.description: While masked as a carnival participant, Blueno approaches Robin and whispers 'CP9', causing her visible shock and triggering the arc's central conflict.
keyMoments.significance: This moment sets the entire Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs in motion by alerting Robin to CP9's presence and causing her to believe the World Government has found her again.

keyMoments.title: Blueno Working as Bartender
keyMoments.description: Blueno is shown working as a bartender in Water 7, maintaining his cover as an ordinary citizen.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Blueno's cover identity while he operates as a CP9 agent in Water 7.

relationships.description: Blueno targets Robin as part of CP9's mission, triggering her fear by mentioning CP9.

evolutionMoments.description: Blueno whispers 'CP9' to Robin, initiating their antagonistic relationship.

reveals.information: Works as a bartender in Water 7 as cover identity
Member of CP9 (revealed only to Robin at this point)

keyMoments.title: Peepley Lulu Defeats Big Helmet Pirates
keyMoments.description: Peepley Lulu helps his fellow Galley-La shipwrights defeat the Big Helmet Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of another skilled Galley-La foreman who showcases the company's strength.

keyMoments.title: Peepley Lulu Introduced as Galley-La Foreman
keyMoments.description: Peepley Lulu is formally introduced as one of the skilled foremen at Galley-La Company.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes him as part of Galley-La's leadership and defense force.

reveals.information: Foreman at Galley-La Company Dock 1

keyMoments.title: Tilestone Defeats Big Helmet Pirates
keyMoments.description: Tilestone joins his fellow Galley-La shipwrights in defeating the Big Helmet Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Tilestone, known for his exceptionally loud voice.

keyMoments.title: Tilestone Introduced as Galley-La Shipwright
keyMoments.description: Tilestone is formally introduced as one of the Galley-La Company's skilled workers.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes him as part of the Galley-La team.

reveals.information: Foreman and caulking specialist at Galley-La Company Dock 1
Known for his extremely loud voice

keyMoments.title: Zambai Leads Attack on Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Zambai leads members of the Franky Family in an attack on the Going Merry, attempting to capture Zoro for his bounty.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the Franky Family and their initial conflict with the Straw Hats, beginning a storyline that will eventually lead to Franky joining the crew.
keyMoments.quote: We are the Franky Family, and we came to collect the bounty on your head!

keyMoments.title: Zambai Defeated by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Zoro easily defeats Zambai and the Franky Family attackers, sending them into the water.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power gap between the Franky Family and the Straw Hats.

relationships.description: Zambai attempts to capture Zoro for his bounty, beginning their antagonistic relationship.

evolutionMoments.description: Zambai attacks Zoro on the Going Merry but is easily defeated.

reveals.information: Member of the Franky Family
Seeks to capture pirates for their bounties

keyMoments.title: Mikazuki Refuses to Pay Galley-La
keyMoments.description: Mikazuki, captain of the Big Helmet Pirates, refuses to pay the Galley-La Company for their ship repairs, leading to confrontation.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the demonstration of Galley-La's combat prowess and establishes that Water 7's shipwrights don't tolerate pirate intimidation.
keyMoments.quote: We're not paying for this overpriced work!

keyMoments.title: Mikazuki Defeated by Galley-La
keyMoments.description: Despite his 36 million berry bounty, Mikazuki and his entire crew are easily crushed by the Galley-La shipwrights.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that bounty amounts don't always reflect true strength, and establishes the formidable nature of Water 7's defenders.

bounties.reason: Captain of the Big Helmet Pirates

reveals.information: 36,000,000 berry bounty
Defeated by Galley-La Company shipwrights despite his bounty

keyMoments.title: Robin Confronted by CP9
keyMoments.description: A masked figure whispers 'CP9' to Robin, causing her visible shock and triggering her traumatic memories of persecution.
keyMoments.significance: This moment initiates Robin's character arc in Water 7/Enies Lobby, as her past catches up with her and forces her to confront her deepest fears about endangering those she cares about.

keyMoments.title: Robin Disappears Mysteriously
keyMoments.description: After the CP9 encounter, Robin vanishes without a trace while Chopper is briefly in the bookstore.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Robin's disappearance and the emotional crisis that will define the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs.

relationships.description: Blueno's mention of CP9 triggers Robin's fear and sets their antagonistic relationship in motion.

evolutionMoments.description: Blueno whispers 'CP9' to Robin, reigniting her trauma from Ohara.

reveals.information: Robin's visible reaction to 'CP9' reveals her deep-seated fear of the World Government's assassins

keyMoments.title: Zoro Confronted by Franky Family
keyMoments.description: While seemingly asleep on the Going Merry, Zoro is attacked by Zambai and the Franky Family seeking to capture him for his bounty.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's constant vigilance in protecting the ship and crew.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Defeats Franky Family
keyMoments.description: Zoro easily defeats the Franky Family attackers and sends them into the water.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the strength gap between the Straw Hats and local bounty hunters.

relationships.description: Zambai and the Franky Family attack Zoro seeking his bounty.

evolutionMoments.description: Franky Family attacks Zoro on the Going Merry, establishing initial conflict.
